expo.name: Bradford Fitness AI

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to scan nutrition labels and track fitness progress.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app accesses your photo library to save and share fitness progress photos.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: This app integrates with HealthKit to track your fitness data and provide personalized recommendations.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: This app updates your health data to keep track of workouts and nutrition.

expo.description: AI-powered personalized fitness and nutrition planning application that creates evidence-based workout and meal plans tailored to individual health profiles.
